","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1535971686054,"updated":1535971735042,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"autotest delivers","cssClass":"c0"},{"value":"regression-youtrack","cssClass":"c20"}]}, {"id":"JT-48790","entityId":"25-2095640","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48790"},{"name":"summary","value":"Can't add an Issue Distribution Report widget to a dashboard"},{"name":"description","value":"

STR:

  • go to a dashboard on hub.jetbrains.com
  • add the widget
  • select YouTrack
  • select New Report
  • enter a name for the report (I used "TestReport")
  • select Hub as a project
  • click Save

AR:

  • An error "Cannot save report: Property FlatDistributionReport.name is invalid" is shown
  • The json of the POST request doesn't include required data
{"$type":"jetbrains.youtrack.reports.impl.distribution.flat.gap.FlatDistributionReport","name":"","projects":[],"xsortOrder":"COUNT_INDEX_DESC","xaxis":{"field":{"$type":"jetbrains.charisma.keyword.PredefinedFilterField","id":"project","presentation":"project"}},"query":"","own":true}

ER: widget configuration ends successfully

please have a look here

green arrow unfolds an issue which is great
but violet arrow does two things
* link to the issue (opens issue in the same location ie: tab in chrome) which is ok
* unfolds an issue which is sensless as it's immediately replaced by opened issue

JetBrains Bug & Issue Tracker YouTrack 2018.2
Build 44389 Tue, Aug 7, 2018, 12:24:21 PM UTC

@Ekaterina Zaikina I was mentioning this issue in slack before. Now we get it reported from a customer.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1533984477355,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3015534","author":"thomas.klaas","authorFullName":"Thomas Klaas","issueId":"JT-48671","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
unfolds an issue which is sensless as it's immediately replaced by opened issue

this is getting worse while opening in new tab with middle mouse button. You end up having multiple issues unfold.
It is even not possible anymore to simply open multiple issues in new tab unless you start from the last issue and go up the list. This way, the popup won't get in your way while clicking.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1534154003711,"updated":1534154023475,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48780","entityId":"25-2095408","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48780"},{"name":"summary","value":"Add calendar for charts"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1534866600493"},{"name":"updated","value":"1535960630674"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Ekaterina_Zaikina"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Ekaterina Zaikina"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-926","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"spring 75","id":"YouTrack:spring 75"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48954","entityId":"25-2106314","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48954"},{"name":"summary","value":"Can't set custom refresh rate on report"},{"name":"description","value":"

What steps will reproduce the problem?

  1. Add report to dashboard
  2. Try to set custom refresh rate
  3. No "save" button appears

This issue is critical for us because dashboard with reports are used by our emploees all the time.
